languages.text: "Эти ведьмы, что были изгнаны из своего культа за связь с Опустошительной бурей — искусные мастера клинков. Тысячи касаний покроют все тело тончайшими порезами, приносящими сладчайшую боль — и все же не дарующими финальное освобождение. Плод их творения будет колебаться на границе жизни и смерти... часами".

"These Wyches, who were banished from their Cult for their connection to the Reaving Tempest, are exquisite artists of the blade. Thousands of touches will cover your entire body with the finest of cuts, delivering the sweetest pain — but never granting ultimate release. The object of their artistry will teeter on the border between life and death... for hours."
languages.original_text: "Эти ведьмы, что были изгнаны из своего культа за связь с Опустошительной бурей — искусные мастера клинков. Тысячи касаний покроют все тело тончайшими порезами, приносящими сладчайшую боль — и все же не дарующими финальное освобождение. Плод их творения будет колебаться на границе жизни и смерти... часами".

languages.text: “这些巫灵曾与狂风阴谋团有来往，因此被逐出了巫灵教派。他们的刀术极其精湛，是这方面的艺术家。他们会将你的全身千刀万剐，以最精细的切割，带来最甜蜜的痛苦，但却永远不会让你获得最终的解脱。他们的艺术对象将会在生死之间徘徊……长达数小时之久。”
languages.original_text: "These Wyches, who were banished from their Cult for their connection to the Reaving Tempest, are exquisite artists of the blade. Thousands of touches will cover your entire body with the finest of cuts, delivering the sweetest pain — but never granting ultimate release. The object of their artistry will teeter on the border between life and death... for hours."

traits.locale_text: “这些巫灵曾与狂风阴谋团有来往，因此被逐出了巫灵教派。他们的刀术极其精湛，是这方面的艺术家。他们会将你的全身千刀万剐，以最精细的切割，带来最甜蜜的痛苦，但却永远不会让你获得最终的解脱。他们的艺术对象将会在生死之间徘徊……长达数小时之久。”

languages.text: 「略奪の嵐との関係を理由に、魔女団から追放されたウィッチ達は、芸術家レベルで優秀な剣の使い手だ。剣が何千回も体に触れ、全身を美しい切り傷だらけにして、最高に甘美な痛みを与えつつ、究極の解放を与えることは絶対にない。ウィッチ達の芸術の餌食は、生と死の境目を…何時間も行ったり来たりするんだ」
languages.original_text: "These Wyches, who were banished from their Cult for their connection to the Reaving Tempest, are exquisite artists of the blade. Thousands of touches will cover your entire body with the finest of cuts, delivering the sweetest pain — but never granting ultimate release. The object of their artistry will teeter on the border between life and death... for hours."

traits.locale_text: 「略奪の嵐との関係を理由に、魔女団から追放されたウィッチ達は、芸術家レベルで優秀な剣の使い手だ。剣が何千回も体に触れ、全身を美しい切り傷だらけにして、最高に甘美な痛みを与えつつ、究極の解放を与えることは絶対にない。ウィッチ達の芸術の餌食は、生と死の境目を…何時間も行ったり来たりするんだ」

languages.text: «Estas brujas, que fueron expulsadas de su culto por su relación con la Tempestad Asoladora, son artistas exquisitas de las armas cortantes. Miles de caricias cubrirán todo tu cuerpo con los cortes más finos, regalándote el dolor más dulce, pero sin llegar a concederte el descanso final. El objeto de su arte se debate entre la vida y la muerte... durante horas».
languages.original_text: "These Wyches, who were banished from their Cult for their connection to the Reaving Tempest, are exquisite artists of the blade. Thousands of touches will cover your entire body with the finest of cuts, delivering the sweetest pain — but never granting ultimate release. The object of their artistry will teeter on the border between life and death... for hours."

traits.locale_text: «Estas brujas, que fueron expulsadas de su culto por su relación con la Tempestad Asoladora, son artistas exquisitas de las armas cortantes. Miles de caricias cubrirán todo tu cuerpo con los cortes más finos, regalándote el dolor más dulce, pero sin llegar a concederte el descanso final. El objeto de su arte se debate entre la vida y la muerte... durante horas».

languages.text: « Les Cérastes qui ont été exclus de leur secte pour avoir pactisé avec la Tempête ravageuse sont passés maîtres dans le maniement de la lame. Ils vous effleureront d'un millier de caresses, criblant votre corps de coupures délicates porteuses de la souffrance la plus suave, sans jamais vous accorder l'ultime délivrance. L'objet de leur savoir-faire vacillera des heures durant sur le fil ténu qui sépare la vie et la mort. »
languages.original_text: "These Wyches, who were banished from their Cult for their connection to the Reaving Tempest, are exquisite artists of the blade. Thousands of touches will cover your entire body with the finest of cuts, delivering the sweetest pain — but never granting ultimate release. The object of their artistry will teeter on the border between life and death... for hours."

traits.locale_text: « Les Cérastes qui ont été exclus de leur secte pour avoir pactisé avec la Tempête ravageuse sont passés maîtres dans le maniement de la lame. Ils vous effleureront d'un millier de caresses, criblant votre corps de coupures délicates porteuses de la souffrance la plus suave, sans jamais vous accorder l'ultime délivrance. L'objet de leur savoir-faire vacillera des heures durant sur le fil ténu qui sépare la vie et la mort. »

languages.text: "Die Hekatari, die wegen ihrer Verbindung zum plünderndem Sturm aus ihrem Kult verbannt wurden, beherrschen die Klinge meisterlich. Tausende von Berührungen werden Euren gesamten Körper mit den feinsten Schnitten versehen und Euch den süßesten Schmerz verschaffen – die ultimative Erlösung werdet Ihr dabei aber nie erfahren. Das Subjekt ihrer Kunst meandert im Grenzbereich zwischen Leben und Tod ... stundenlang."
languages.original_text: "These Wyches, who were banished from their Cult for their connection to the Reaving Tempest, are exquisite artists of the blade. Thousands of touches will cover your entire body with the finest of cuts, delivering the sweetest pain — but never granting ultimate release. The object of their artistry will teeter on the border between life and death... for hours."

Das Subjekt ihrer Kunst meandert im Grenzbereich zwischen Leben und Tod ... stundenlang."

languages.text: "Tarikattan Müfteris Kasırga ile bağlantıları yüzünden sürgün edilen bu Viçler, bıçakla harikalar yaratan sanatçılardır. Binlerce dokunuş, en iyi kesiklerle tüm bedenini kaplayarak sana en tatlı acıyı sunacak ancak... Nihai kurtuluşu asla bahşetmeyecek. Sanatkârlıklarını konuşturdukları varlık, yaşam ile ölüm arasındaki çizgide yalpalanıp durur... Hem de saatlerce."
languages.original_text: "These Wyches, who were banished from their Cult for their connection to the Reaving Tempest, are exquisite artists of the blade. Thousands of touches will cover your entire body with the finest of cuts, delivering the sweetest pain — but never granting ultimate release. The object of their artistry will teeter on the border between life and death... for hours."
